overview: Documentary on the Fukushima nuclear disaster. The film sees the two protagonists venture into the forbidden area up to a few hundred meters from the plant There are interviews with important personalities involved in the story such as Katsunobu Sakurai, mayor of Minamisoma, Seiichi Nakate, exponent of the Network "Save the children from radiations" , and Prime Minister Naoto Kan.
title: Fukushame - Il Giappone perduto
